amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that equipment and products purchased with financial assistance made available under section 117 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act should be American-made.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to encourage the purchase of American-made products and require a report on expenditures on foreign-made items within 180 days of the expenditure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
